dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hahahahaha! Oh my gosh, you are not going to believe this!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hahahahaha! Oh my gosh, you are not going to believe this!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: What, uh, what is it now? Your face!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: What, uh, what is it now? Your face!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! From April 1st to November 1st, 2025!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! From April first to November first, twenty twenty five!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Pavlodar Airport will be closed for reconstruction from April 1 to November 1, 2025, according to Pavlodar-online.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Whoa, that's, like, a solid seven months! That's huge!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Whoa, that's, like, a solid seven months! That's huge!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Pavlodar Airport will be closed for reconstruction from April 1 to November 1, 2025...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right?! And for, like, reconstruction, a major overhaul!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right?! And for, like, reconstruction, a major overhaul!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A major overhaul is planned at Pavlodar Airport.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, I saw that bit! Yeah! And the akim, like, totally gave it to his subordinates!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, I saw that bit! Yeah! And the akim, like, totally gave it to his subordinates!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Akim Asain Bayhanov scolded his subordinates for not informing the population about the reconstruction dates in time.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! For not telling people sooner! It's so classic!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! For not telling people sooner! It's so classic!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Akim Asain Bayhanov scolded his subordinates for not informing the population about the reconstruction dates in time.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah! And um, it's because the runway needs to be expanded, right? Or no airworthiness certificate in 2026!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah! And um, it's because the runway needs to be expanded, right? Or no airworthiness certificate in twenty twenty six!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The runway is planned to be reconstructed and expanded. Without reconstruction in 2026, the airport will not be able to receive an airworthiness certificate and accept flights.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! Like, they have to do it! But get this, they promised it for late 2024 initially!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! Like, they have to do it! But get this, they promised it for late twenty twenty four initially!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Pavlodar residents were promised completion of the repair of the runway by late autumn 2024.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I know! But then, like, all the lengthy contractor procedures, ugh.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know! But then, like, all the lengthy contractor procedures, ugh.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: However, the deadlines were changed due to lengthy competitive procedures for selecting a contractor.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Ugh, yes, exactly! Always the way!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ugh, yes, exactly! Always the way!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And it's not just the runway, right? The building too!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it's not just the runway, right? The building too!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In 2025, the reconstruction will also be carried out in the airport building.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my gosh, yes! Expansion, an extension, escalators!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my gosh, yes! Expansion, an extension, escalators!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the head of the region, the building will be expanded - an extension will appear, escalators will be installed inside.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Escalators! In Pavlodar airport! That's wild!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Escalators! In Pavlodar airport! That's wild!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I know! Itâ€™s, uh, like, big changes coming!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know! It's, uh, like, big changes coming!
